attributes.action: introduce exemptions to allow allow tobacco advertising
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If charities and the government are allowed to promote smoking abstinence, it follows that the promotion of tobacco consumption should be allowed. 

Just because you feel that your view is the correct one, you do not have the right to silence those who you campaign against. 

In a free market and an open society, any business should have the right to promote itself.
